metadata.title: CVE-2024-54145 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is an open source performance and fault management framework. Cactihas a SQL injection vulnerability in the get_discovery_results function ofautomation_devices.php using the network parameter. This vulnerability isfixed in 1.2.29.

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
